Later the War is an upcoming American psychological thriller film written and directed by Charlie Kaufman.
Premise
A creator of dreams abruptly begins to create nightmares for people instead.
Cast
* Eddie Redmayne
* Tessa Thompson
* Patsy Ferran
Production
It was announced in February 2025 that Charlie Kaufman was set to write and direct the film, an adaptation of a short story written by Iddo Gefen. Eddie Redmayne, Tessa Thompson and Patsy Ferran were cast to star.
References
External links
*[https://www.imdb.com/title/tt35892599/ Later the War] at the Internet Movie Database
